items.en: 'Being gay in men's football is a very toxic place'
items.text_for_match: 'Being gay in men's football is a very toxic place' Australian Josh Cavallo, who moved to England in July to join non-league Peterborough Sports, says football has got "mountains to do" to tackle homophobia. Australian Josh Cavallo, who moved to England in July to join non-league Peterborough Sports, says football has got "mountains to do" to tackle homophobia.

items.ja: 'Tough moments' after Saudi move -  Henderson
items.en: 'Tough moments' after Saudi move -  Henderson
items.text_for_match: 'Tough moments' after Saudi move -  Henderson England midfielder Jordan Henderson says he has had "tough moments" since leaving Liverpool for Saudi Arabia and could "have made different decisions". England midfielder Jordan Henderson says he has had "tough moments" since leaving Liverpool for Saudi Arabia and could "have made different decisions".

items.ja: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion
items.en: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion
items.text_for_match: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion Arsenal hold internal discussions about expanding the capacity of Emirates Stadium, which currently sits just over 60,000. Arsenal hold internal discussions about expanding the capacity of Emirates Stadium, which currently sits just over 60,000.

items.ja: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal
items.en: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal
items.text_for_match: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal Arsenal reward goalkeeper David Raya with an improved contract to underline his status as one of Mikel Arteta's key players. Arsenal reward goalkeeper David Raya with an improved contract to underline his status as one of Mikel Arteta's key players.
